sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function ViewBeer() { const [beer,setBeer] = useState({ id:0, name:"", color:"", producer:null, alcoholLvl:0, price:0, packaging:"", beerBreweries:[] }); const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ loadEmployee(); },) const loadEmployee=async()=>{ const result = await axios.get("api/beers/${id}"); setBeer(result.data);} return (

Beer Details

Details of beer {beer.id}:
  • Name: {beer.name}
  • Producer {beer.producer?.id}:

    Name: {beer.producer?.name}
    Country: {beer.producer?.country}
    Founding Year: {beer.producer?.founding_year}
    Description: {beer.producer?.descr}
    Number of breweries: {beer.producer?.nrOfBreweries}

  • Color: {beer.color}
  • Alcohol Level: {beer.alcoholLvl}
  • Price: {String(beer.price)}
  • Breweries: {beer.beerBreweries.map(beerBrewery => (

    Brewery {beerBrewery?.brewery.id}
    Quantity: {beerBrewery?.quantity}
    Tested: {beerBrewery?.tested.toString()}
    ))}
Back to Home
) }
